title: Baomain Triple Rocker Light Switch, 15A 120V, 3 Switches, Commercial Grade, White

feature_bullets: Space saving design fits multiple devices in a single wall box

customers_say: Customers find the light switch works well and is easy to install, with good value for money and positive visual appeal. Moreover, they appreciate its functionality, with one customer noting it works perfectly as a replacement for unavailable 3-stack switches, and another mentioning it's particularly useful in bathrooms. However, the quality and switch functionality receive mixed reviews - while some find it solid, others report it breaking after a couple of weeks, and while the switches generally work well, one customer mentions issues with the middle switch not flipping properly. Additionally, customers disagree on the fit, with some saying it's perfect while others find it too large.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Years ago I bought a bathroom light, vent night light unit. The switch for the light wore out. I looked at the manufacturer's website hoping to order a replacement but learned that the model I had no longer was available. I looked for similar models in the hope of buy a switch for it. They didn't have any. I found this one on Amazon and it works perfectly.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsDoes what it’s made for

customer_reviews.review_snippet: Overall, this is a great switch so far.  For the price you can’t beat the Quality.  Install was easy and switch was replaced in about 10 minutes.

customer_reviews.review_snippet: I use this switch for our bathroom fan that also has a main ceiling light and a nightlight. The quality seems to be good.

customer_reviews.review_snippet: Well built, solid. Used for a bathroom light fan and heat fixture that was decades old. Easy to connect wires. Switches work well.
